name: YWBMBIGTTR/HHCSHTMOTW
description:
YWBMBIGTTR/HHCSHTMOTW are my two mini-RPGS for August 2018.

In YWBMBIGTTR ("You won't believe me but I got the ruins!") you play Victorian explorers back from their adventures on the Moon, or so they say. In HHCSHTMOTW ("Holy heck, crazy stuff happened to me on the way!") you play yourself, late for coffee with your friends but with a good excuse, or not...
